name: Web Pixlr Editor
description: Pixlr Editor is an online image-editing tool which is similar to PhotoShop. You can edit photos rapidly, carry out simple image-processing, and easily create exquisite images with Pixlr Editor. Finished images can be saved as JPEG, PNG, BMP or PXD and other formats. It is practical and convenient.

en_US.description: Pixlr Editor is an online image-editing tool which is similar to PhotoShop. You can edit photos rapidly, carry out simple image-processing, and easily create exquisite images with Pixlr Editor. Finished images can be saved as JPEG, PNG, BMP or PXD and other formats. It is practical and convenient.
en_US.name: Web Pixlr Editor

zh_CN.description: Pixlr Editor是一个在线图片编辑工具，与PhotoShop非常相似。借助Pixlr Editor，您可以快速的编辑照片、进行简单的图片处理，轻松的制作出非常精美的图片。做好的图片可以直接儲存成JPEG、PNG、BMP或PXD等格式，相当实用、方便。
zh_CN.name: Pixlr Editor网页版
